DOC.brief_summary: This study purpose is (1) to develop the new energy expenditure equation; (2) to increase accuracy of energy cost prediction of cycle ergometer; (3) to find out some dependent factors.
DOC.brief_title: Study on Energy Cost Prediction of Cycle Ergometer
DOC.detailed_description: Oxygen consumption (ml/min) was measured while subjects were at rest and exercised at four submaximal workloads in steady state on cycle ergometer. Bioelectrical impedance analysis was used to estimate the body fats and skeletal muscle mass.
DOC.criteria: Healthy female Never received bicycle training Exercise testing contraindications
